songs.title: Hotel Lobby*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Chorus]
Oh (Kay)
I'm with two bad bitches in the hotel lobby (Yeah I am)
And we all turnt up 'cause we all dressed highkey (It is what it is)
Figure out what it is, after all these secrets (Figure out too)
She got a man at home and you know she creeping (Figure out too)
I'm with two bad bitches in the hotel lobby (And you know me)
And we all turnt up 'cause we all dressed highkey (And you know these)
Gotta a bottle in my hand and you don't use it, babe (Use it, babe)
She with the new new niggas and you know we lit for her

[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus]
Oh (Kay)
I'm with two bad bitches in the hotel lobby (Oh yeah)
And we all turnt up 'cause we all dressed highkey (It is what it is, yeah)
Figure out what it is, after all these secrets (Figure out too, yeah)
She got a man at home and you know she creeping (Figure out too, ooh)
I'm with two bad bitches in the hotel lobby (And you know me)
And we all turnt up 'cause we all dressed highkey (And you know these, okay)
Gotta a bottle in my hand and you don't use it, babe (Yeah, use it, babe)
She with the new new niggas and you know we lit for her
